alert.note: Alert for Schleicher (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 19 at 1:41PM CDT until further notice by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Arroyo and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of west central Texas, including the following counties, Irion and Schleicher. * WHEN...Until 345 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 141 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause arroyo and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mertzon, Sherwood, Arden and Barnhart. - This includes the following Low Water Crossings... Ranch Road 853 crossing Middle Concho River, RM 853 crossing Dry Draw, Sherwood Cemetery crossing, County Road 202 crossing Spring Creek, County Road 113 crossing Dove Creek, crossings along County Road 302, crossings along County Road 411 and County Road 202 crossing Lopez Creek. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
